title: Bloomberg Markets: Graff on Fed Outlook for Remainder of 2017
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Graff on Fed Outlook for Remainder of 2017
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Thomas Graff Portfolio Manager Brown Advisory Incorporated Discussing Fed policy and the possibility of interest rate hikes in September or December.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
